[Finally somebody is replying to these dimwits.]

"Hey Moe hey Moe lemme drive lemme drive," the same 'bot kept saying over 
and over again. "Shaddup you lunk head," one of the three said and hit him 
in the head. (Keep in mind that when these guys hit each other or something 
like that the sound effects happen as well.) "Ooh, ooh, you bully. Ruff, 
ruff," the fool barked.

>::Incarcinator::

>bit.
